H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H3092.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahilud<SDBH:אֲחִילוּד>}; ► recorder; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6340.def: = process by which humans leave their normal location and move away in different directions, usually not of their own volition

H2505.def: = causative action by which humans or deities divide an object (or range of objects) into portions; ► usually with the intention to use one or more of these portions for a particular purpose

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3032.def: = action by which an object is caused to move from someone's hands toward a surface or place nearby

H1486.def: = specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions

H3206.def: = posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H6865.def: = extremely hard type of stone that leaves sharp edges when fractured; ► can be used as knife; ≈ associated with an inflexible attitude

H6721.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; presumably a personification of the city that played a prominent role in Canaanite culture and history

H6429.def: = land of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלִשְׁתִּי>}, situated along the coast of the Meditteranean and concentrated around the cities of {L:Gaza<SDBH:עַזָּה>}, {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}, {L:Ekron<SDBH:עֶקְרֹון>}, {L:Ashdod<SDBH:אַשְׁדֹּוד>}, and {L:Ashkelon<SDBH:אַשְׁקְלֹון>}

H1576.def: = action by which humans act towards other humans or deities in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H1580.def: = causative process by which a mother causes her baby to become accustomed to food other than its mother's milk

H7031.def: = state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy

H4120.def: = action by which humans or deities act without delay

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H4261.def: = inanimate objects that are the object of someone's desire, ◄ because of their quality or value

H1964.def: = a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H7368.def: = state in which humans or objects are located in a place that is at a relatively great distance from the point of reference

H1366.def: = a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1576.def: = action by which humans act towards other humans or deities in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H5066.def: = state in which objects are close to other objects in space

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3807.def: = causative action by which humans use excessive power to break an object into little pieces

H855.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H4211.def: = knife or metal blade, sometimes attached to a long wooden handle; ► used for cutting away or cutting back unproductive branches so they can produce better

H7420.def: = a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp {L:iron<SDBH:בַּרְזֶל>} head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

H2523.def: = state in which humans have run out of physical strength

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H5789.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = process by which an event is performed quickly

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H5181.def: = action by which humans or supernatural beings move down from a place of higher elevation

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3092.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahilud<SDBH:אֲחִילוּד>}; ► recorder; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H4038.def: = large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15-20 centimeters); ► used for cutting grain

H1310.def: = process by which food is getting ready for consumption by being immersed in boiling water for a prolonged period

H7287.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise authority over (other) humans, animals, and areas, often with focus on the manner in which this is done

H1660.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H3342.def: = large container; ◄ normally hewn out of stone and part of a winepress; ► where the grape juice is collected

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H1995.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, sometimes associated with natural phenomena like heavy rain and the waves of a stormy sea

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H3394.def: = one of the celestial bodies which govern time, seasons and other events on earth, marked by a white and cold light and seen by night

H6937.def: = process by which an object becomes dark in color

H3556.def: = celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H5051.def: = process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7580.def: = action by which animals, humans, or deities produce a full, deep, prolonged sound as made by a lion; ≈ associated with aggression, but also with suffering

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4268.def: = location where one goes to find protection or safety; ◄ because of difficult circumstances

H4581.def: = large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H5197.def: = process by which liquids flow in small drops

H6071.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation and probably still relatively fresh; ► used as beverage; ≈ associated with agriculture, joy, and well-being, but also with drunkenness; also used in metaphors for aggression and sex

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H2461.def: = white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well-being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex

H650.def: = river bed that contains water in the rainy season only; ≈ considered as deceptive as one never can never be entirely sure as to whether they contain water or not

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H4599.def: = an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of blessing

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8248.def: = state in which objects contain a certain amount of moisture

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H123.def: = man; usually referred to as {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H2555.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans behave aggressively towards other humans, ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8210.def: = causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance

H5355.def: = state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5352.def: literally: to be cleaned out; hence: = causative action by which a city is deprived of its inhabitants

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place
